Question: Guangdong Zhaoneng Technology co., ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangdong Zhaoneng Technology Co., Ltd.

Product 1: Lithium Polymer Battery

 - Specializes in lithium polymer batteries
 - Focus on R&D, manufacturing, and sales
 - Adheres to international standards

Product 2: Li-ion Batteries

 - Professional manufacturer of 18650 lithium-ion batteries
 - Integrates design, development, and production
 - Features advanced equipment and quality control systems

Product 3: Dry Battery (AA, AAA, D, C, 9V)

 - Manufacturer of environmental protection dry batteries
 - Engaged in the battery energy industry
 - Combines research, development, design, and manufacturing

(Stand information and other company details are excluded as they are not part of Guangdong Zhaoneng Technology Co., Ltd. product highlights and specifications.)
Summary_cn:
广东照能科技有限公司。

产品1：聚合物锂电池

- 专门从事聚合物锂电池
- 专注于研发、制造和销售
- 坚持国际标准

产品2：锂离子电池

- 18650锂离子电池的专业制造商
- 集设计、开发和生产于一体
- 拥有先进设备和质量控制系统

产品3：干电池（AA、AAA、D、C、9V）

- 环保干电池的制造商
- 从事电池能源行业
- 综合研究、开发、设计和制造
